title: En Nanbane Lyrics Mankatha Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Madhusree, Yuvan
Song : Nanbane
Lyrics : Vaali
Music Director : Yuvan Shankar Raja

En Nanbane ennai yethaayo
En paavamaai vandhu vaaithaai
Un polave nalla nadigan oh.
Oorengilum illai oruvan

Nallavargal yaaro, theeyavargal yaaro
Kandukondu kanni yaarum kadhal seivadhilaye
Gangai nadhi yellam kanil nadhiyendru
Pirpaadu gnanam vandhu laabam ennavo

Kadhal enbathu, kanavu maaligai
Purindhu kolladi en thozhiye
Unmai kadhalai naan thaedi parkiren
Kaanavillaye en thozhiye..

Valaikkayai pidithu, valaikayail vilndhu
Valakaram pidithu, valam vara ninaithaen
Uravennum kavithai, uyirnil varaindhu
Ezhuthiya kavithai,
en muthal vari mudhal mulluvadhum pilai vizhigalil vali
Vilundhadhu, ellaam unnaalthaan
Idhuponra gnyangal, enaken indha kaayangal
Kilithaai Oru kadhal oviyam ..oh

Murugan mugam aaru thaan
Manothan mugam nooru thaan
Ovvendrum veru veru niramo

En Nanbane ennai yethaai...
Kaadhal velluma,kaadhal thorkuma
Yaarum arindhathilaye en thozhiye
kaadhal oviyam kilindhu ponadha
Kavalai yenadi Idhuvum kadandhidum

Adikadi ennai nee, annaithathai ariven
Anbennum vizhakai annaithathai ariven
Puyal vandhu saaitha manam oru viragu
Unnakenna theiriyum
En idhayathil vandhu vilundhathu idi
Ilam manam engum irundhadhu vali
Emma emma ulagil ulla pengale
Uraipen oru ponmozhi

Kadhal oru kanavu maaligai.. oh ..
Idhuvum angu maayam thaan
Ellam varnajaalam thaan
Nambaamal vazhvadhenrum nalame...

Kadhal enbathu, kanavu maaligai
Purindhu kolladi en thozhiye
Unmai kadhalai naan thaedi parkiren
Kaanavillaye en thozhiye..
